title.rendered: “Israel’s ‘Arrow’ System Successfully Intercepts Majority of Iranian Missiles: Insights from IDF Spokesperson”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The vast majority of the missiles launched from Iran were intercepted outside Israel’s borders.

A short while ago, dozens of ground-to-ground missile launches from Iran were detected making their way to our territory.
Our air defense fighters successfully intercepted them using the “Arrow” system, and in coordination with our strategic partner nations, most of these launches were intercepted before they could reach our territory.
Only a few hits were identified, including one on a military base in the south with minor infrastructure damage.

In the past few hours, countless enemy drones along with dozens of cruise missiles making their way to Israel territory from Iran have been identified and intercepted. Dozens of air force aircraft continue to intercept all air threats making their way to Israeli territory at this moment.

IDF forces are deployed across all theaters, prepared and continuing the defense of our territory.

Attached is footage from recent air force base operations: https://bit.ly/3JgXd1l

Also attached is footage of air force readiness in recent weeks: https://bit.ly/3vIScMa
